sections.summary:
Flexible accounting professional who adapts seamlessly to constantly evolving accounting processes and technologies.
Highlights
Public and private accounting Budgeting
Analytical reasoning Payroll
Account reconciliations Highly dependable
Strong communication skills Self-motivated
QuickBooks expert Fast Learner
Accomplishments
Initiated the use of a computerized accounting system
Increased office organization by developing a more efficient filing system
Updated excel charts and worksheets to be more efficient
